医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
许多老年人对接种呼吸道合胞病毒疫苗表现出兴趣随着全新疫苗已开始运抵药房和诊所，第一批 60 岁以上的美国人刚刚开始卷起袖子接种呼吸道合胞病毒 (RSV) 疫苗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230822/Many-older-adults-show-interest-in-getting-vaccinated-against-respiratory-syncytial-virus.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230822/Many-older-adults-show-interest-in-getting-vaccinated-against-respiratory-syncytial-virus.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=98ad6c93-3e54-40b0-a306-ce620a43218e Tue, 22 Aug 2023 12:03:05 -0400 Many older adults show interest in getting vaccinated against respiratory syncytial virus
研究表明气候变化可能影响免疫系统挪威卑尔根大学的一项开创性研究表明，气候变化可能会影响我们的免疫系统。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230822/Climate-change-could-impact-the-immune-system-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230822/Climate-change-could-impact-the-immune-system-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8d9f3dc1-4fc5-4c2d-9ad9-f00b3d28330f Tue, 22 Aug 2023 11:54:38 -0400 Climate change could impact the immune system, study shows

缺乏两种大脑蛋白质可能会导致强迫性重复行为我们的行为是通过大脑中的神经回路控制的。分子紊乱可能导致刻板行为，如强迫症和自闭症谱系障碍等神经精神疾病中所见。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230822/Absence-of-two-brain- Proteins-may-lead-to-compulsive-repetitive-behavior.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230822/Absence-of-two-brain- Proteins-may-lead-to-compulsive-repetitive-behavior.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e6b03dd7-7067-480b-b461-7f48be64b0e4 Tue, 22 Aug 2023 11:45:15 -0400 Absence of two brain proteins may lead to compulsive repetitive behavior

保持健康可能有助于预防心房颤动和中风一项对 15,000 多人进行的研究发现，身体健康与患房颤和中风的可能性较低有关。该研究已在 2023 年 ESC 大会上发表。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230822/Keeping-fit-may-help-prevent-atrial-fibrillation-and-中风.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230822/Keeping-fit-may-help-prevent-atrial-fibrillation-and-中风.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3fe2d1e4-034c-4015-b823-8ff4a09e4202 Tue, 22 Aug 2023 11:33:00 -0400 Keeping fit may help prevent atrial fibrillation and stroke

识别心脏病发作症状并采取行动与更快的治疗和更好的结果相关根据 2023 年 ESC 大会上发表的研究，识别心脏病发作症状并采取行动与更快地挽救生命有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230822/Recognizing-and-acting-on-heart-attack-symptoms-linked-to-faster-treatment-better-outcomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230822/Recognizing-and-acting-on-heart-attack-symptoms-linked-to-faster-treatment-better-outcomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9765f55e-0826-450b-a666-74d75cbaf46f Tue, 22 Aug 2023 10:39:09 -0400 Recognizing and acting on heart attack symptoms linked to faster treatment, better outcomes
心脏病发作后坚持服用阿司匹林可降低心脏病复发、中风和死亡的风险根据 2023 年 ESC 大会上发表的研究，与持续服用阿司匹林的心脏病患者相比，不每日服用阿司匹林的心脏病患者复发心肌梗塞、中风或死亡的可能性更高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230822/Aspirin-adherence-after-heart-attack-linked-to-lower-risk-of-recurrent-heart-attack-中风-death.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230822/Aspirin-adherence-after-heart-attack-linked-to-lower-risk-of-recurrent-heart-attack-中风-death.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b8996972-e39b-4b53-9bcc-228857e82b69 Tue, 22 Aug 2023 10:28:15 -0400 Aspirin adherence after heart attack linked to lower risk of recurrent heart attack, stroke, death
